title: The nexus of immigration regulation and health governance: a scoping review of the extent to which right to access healthcare by migrants, refugees and asylum seekers was upheld in the United Kingdom during COVID-19
content:
Publication date: July 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 232

Author(s): M.C. Van Hout, R. Madroumi, M.D. Andrews, R. Arnold, V.D. Hope, M. Taegtmeyer
